column2: You are not sure when §Y[Root.GetFullName]§! joined your court or what [Root.GetSheHe]'s doing here.\n\nIf you were to ask §Y[Root.GetFullName]§! to leave, the court would feel less crowded...
column3: Vous ne savez pas quand §Y[Root.GetFullName]§! a rejoint votre Cour ni même ce qu'[Root.GetIlElle] fait là.\n\nSi vous lui demandiez de partir, la Cour serait moins bondée...
column4: Ihr seid Euch nicht sicher, seit wann §Y[Root.GetFullName]§! sich an Eurem Hof befindet und was [Root.GetSheHe] hier eigentlich macht.\n\nWenn Ihr §Y[Root.GetFullName]§! darum bitten würdet, zu gehen, wäre Euer Hof weniger überlaufen ...
column6: No estás segur[Root.GetOA] de cuándo §Y[Root.GetFullName]§! se unió a la corte o qué hace aquí.\n\nSi pidieses a §Y[Root.GetFullName]§! que se marchase, la corte parecería menos llena…

column2: There is a playable ruler in the world who is NOT §Y[From.GetFullName]§!
§Y[Root.GetFullName]§! is NOT an important member of your court (or busy, or inaccessible, etc)
§Y[Root.GetFullName]§! has no §Yspouses§! who are important members of your court (or busy, or inaccessible, etc)
§Y[Root.GetFullName]§! has no §Yconsorts/concubines§! who are important members of your court (or busy, or inaccessible, etc)
§Y[Root.GetFullName]§! has no §Yunderage children§! who are important members of your court (or busy, or inaccessible, etc)
§Y[Root.GetFullName]§! (and §Yanyone else§! who leaves your court - see below) is §YDisappointed§! (§R-5 opinion§! for §Y10 years§!).

§Y[Root.GetFullName]§! moves to §Ga relative's court§!.\nAll of [Root.GetFullName]'s §Yspouses§!, §Yconsorts§!, §Yconcubines§! and §Yunderage children§! who are currently in your court will follow [Root.GetHerHim] to the same court.

§Y[Root.GetFullName]§! moves to §Ga friendly court§!.\nAll of [Root.GetFullName]'s §Yspouses§!, §Yconsorts§!, §Yconcubines§! and §Yunderage children§! who are currently in your court will follow [Root.GetHerHim] to the same court.

§Y[Root.GetFullName]§! moves to §Ra random (probably unfriendly) court§!.\nAll of [Root.GetFullName]'s §Yspouses§!, §Yconsorts§!, §Yconcubines§! and §Yunderage children§! who are currently in your court will follow [Root.GetHerHim] to the same court.
